text:
Thank you, that was of great help! I have understood all of the pillars that you have mentioned. What i like about your role,  is the flexibility , which allows you to do many interesting task.

What degree did you pursue  to get to this position that you are in?

What are the skills/qualities  that your company looks for when you are employing for the company? Also do you guys look at which university someone  has graduated when it comes to employing people?

As i am also interested in engineering. I was thinking to take mechanical engineering  at university, which i believe would allow me to have more options after graduation including the chance to work in the finance sector. What are your opinions?

Furthermore what experiences are essential to get before you apply to a job? And how would you attain that specific experience?

Would you be able to give me feedback on my personal statement?
